text: Sofía Rivera Torres (born Sofía Rivera Torres Martin del Campo, San Diego, California, September 18, 1992) is an American TV presenter, radio host, internet celebrity and reality television personality. == Career == Rivera Torres began her television career in 2014, as the host for All Access, an EDM TV Show which aired through E! Entertainment Television Latin America. The following year, she hosted The Release, also an EDM TV Show, produced by Vice Media and broadcast through Canal Sony. In 2016 she joined Imagen Noticias as entertainment news presenter, aired through Imagen Televisión. Currently, Rivera Torres stars in the reality television show El Mundo Real through Facebook Watch and co-hosts Imagen Televisión's late night talkshow ¡Qué Importa!. Rivera Torres regularly contributes as a writer for Excélsior Mexican newspaper and has performed in two feature films: Café Con Leche Directed by Ray Gallardo and El Vestido directed by Roque Falabella. She is of Mexican-American ethnicity. == References == Category:American people of Mexican descent Category:Television personalities from California Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Diego County, California Category:American television hosts Category:American radio hosts Category:American women television personalities Category:Women radio presenters Category:Women television presenters Category:21st-century American actresses Category:American film actresses Category:The Real World (TV series) cast members
title: Sofia Rivera Torres
